name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week	Date	Focus	Focused Mini-Test
1	2/23	Course Introduction	
2	3/2	Reading I	p. 426-434
3	3/9	Reading II	p. 435-439, 463-467
4	3/16	Reading III	p. 468-476
5	3/23	Reading Review	
6	3/30	Listening I	p. 440-446
7	4/6	Listening II	p. 447-453
8	4/13	Listening III	p. 477-483
9	4/20	Listening Review	
10	4/27	Writing I	p. 459-461
11	5/4	Writing II	p. 496-497
12	5/11	Writing III	p. 498
13	5/18	Writing Review	
14	5/25	Speaking I	p. 454-456
15	6/1	Speaking II	p. 457-458
16	6/8	Speaking III	p. 491-493
17	6/15	Speaking IV	p. 494-495
18	6/22	Final Exam
scorePolicy: Attendance & Participation (15%); Quizzes (35%); Take-home & In-class activities/assignments (25%); Final (25%).
materials: Phillips, Deborah. (2007). Preparation Course for the TOEFL Test: iBT. White Plains, NY: Longman.
